scripts.start: npm run clean && cross-env DEBUG=* wmr
scripts.build: npm run clean && cross-env DEBUG=* wmr build --prerender && npm run afterbuild
scripts.build-repeat-if-fail: (npm run build || npm run build || npm run build || npm run build || npm run build || npm run build || npm run build || npm run build || npm run build || npm run build || exit 0) || echo OK
scripts.build-github: npm run clean && cross-env DEBUG=* BUILD_FOR_GITHUB=1 wmr build --prerender && npm run afterbuild
scripts.build-github-repeat-if-fail: (npm run build-github || npm run build-github || npm run build-github || npm run build-github || npm run build-github || npm run build-github || npm run build-github || npm run build-github || npm run build-github || npm run build-github || exit 0) || echo OK
scripts.build-viz: npm run clean && cross-env DEBUG=* wmr build --prerender --visualize && npm run afterbuild
scripts.lint: npm run lint:editorconfig && npm run lint:eslint && npm run lint-stylelint && npm run lint-prettier && npm run typescript
scripts.lint-fix: npm run eslint-fix && npm run prettier-fix && npm run stylelint-fix
